The lectures will be provided in form of screencasts. Hence, you can choose individually when to watch it and you can rewatch it throughout the semester. The time of the lecture is therefore merely a suggestion. However, you should make it a weekly habit to watch the newest screencast, since in the tutorial it will be assumed that everybody is up to date.

The contents may refer to a past semester, but the knowledge and information about the topics stay the same. You should always watch all screencasts up to the one mentioned leading to the next tutorial (so for the first tutorial watch until 'here for
'). So check at the beginning of each week to stay up to date. Contents from the screencasts uploaded on monday will be relevant in the tutorial next tuesday!
